pr_title: [VMware] Cannot migrate VM on PVLAN shared network

timeline.bodyText: @nvazquez Have you observed similar issues with router VM using similar type casting in the if stmt above. eg: DomainRouterVO router = (DomainRouterVO) vm.getVirtualMachine();. Same casting is being used for router VM in other methods below. May be you can check and fix for router VM as well. Thanks.
timeline.author: sureshanaparti

replies.bodyText: Thanks @sureshanaparti. I have not observed errors in those other castings but will be nice to solve the problem instead of the workaround I'm proposing in this fix, will take a look into that
replies.author: nvazquez

timeline.message: Cannot migrate VM on PVLAN shared network
